law.catch_line: Property Insurance For Business, Professional Or Governmental Operation; Multi Peril Homeowners Insurance For Condominiums

text.section: contains a loss settlement clause which provides coverage for property loss to the extent of the actual cash value of the damage to the insured unit or structure; or
contains a loss settlement clause which provides coverage for property loss on the basis of like-kind-and-quality replacement cost; or
contains, in accordance with clause Twelfth A of section ninety-nine
a loss settlement clause which provides functional replacement or repair cost coverage;
which otherwise limits an insurerâ€™s liability for property loss to the tax assessment value of the insured unit or structure; or

which otherwise requires actual cash value loss settlement calculations to be based upon the fair market value of the insured unit or structure, net of land value, without consideration of replacement cost less accrued depreciation due to physical deterioration and functional and economic obsolescence; provided, however, such policy forms shall not be issued or renewed when the market value of the unit or structure proposed to be insured is less than the total amount of mortgage liens outstanding upon such unit or structure at the time of policy issuance or renewal.
